title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 2 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 2 2022
description:
Jeff Zucker out as head of CNN due to not disclosing relationship with subordinate -- or maybe more as Clay predicts. Buck's insider Jeff Zucker story. Clay's idea to save CNN from Cuomo and Zucker madness: Hire Megyn Kelly. Trump Destroys Zucker in statement: "World-class sleazebag." Buck notes: "Trump broke CNN. It was never the same after Trump." Johns Hopkins study agrees with what C&B have been saying all along: Lockdowns didn't work and should most likely never be used again. Dr. Wen: Don't vaccinate kids under 5 until it's safe. Clay's "spicy" TV debate with Geraldo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
